text:
In the script ${catalina.home}/bin/catalina.sh line 135 the classpath is set 
to:
CLASSPATH="$CLASSPATH":"$CATALINA_HOME"/bin/bootstrap.jar:"$CATALINA_HOME"/bin/
commons-logging-api.jar

Reading the logging documention under the Tomcat 6 web site it seems that 
this ./bin/commons-logging-api.jar in the classpath is not required anymore 
and thus this seems unnecessary.

Rgds - Fred
creator: fredk2@gmail.com
